points.name: AdptCtlReq
points.label: Set Active Control Request
points.desc: Set active control. 0 = No active control.

points.name: AdptCtlRslt
points.label: Set Active Control Result
points.desc: Result of last set active control operation.

points.name: RvrtTms
points.label: Reversion Timeout
points.desc: Reversion time in seconds.  0 = No reversion time.

points.name: RspTms_SF
points.label: Open-Loop Scale Factor
points.desc: Open loop response time scale factor.

points.name: DbOf
points.label: Over-Frequency Deadband
points.desc: The deadband value for over-frequency conditions in Hz.

points.name: DbUf
points.label: Under-Frequency Deadband
points.desc: The deadband value for under-frequency conditions in Hz.

points.name: KOf
points.label: Over-Frequency Change Ratio
points.desc: Frequency droop per-unit frequency change for over-frequency conditions corresponding to 1 per-unit power output change.

points.name: KUf
points.label: Under-Frequency Change Ratio
points.desc: Frequency droop per-unit frequency change for under-frequency conditions corresponding to 1 per-unit power output change.

points.name: RspTms
points.label: Open-Loop Response Time
points.desc: The open-loop response time in seconds.

points.name: PMin
points.label: Minimum Active Power
points.desc: The minimum active power output due to DER prime mover constraints, in percent of the DER active power rating. The valid range is -100 to 100. This setting applies only to the frequency droop control.
